Class BaseUserController

java.lang.Object
controller.BaseUserController
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserController
Direct Known Subclasses:
CompanyRepresentativeController, StaffController, StudentController
public abstract class BaseUserController extends Object implements UserController
Base abstract class for user controllers providing common functionality. Implements UserController interface (Interface Segregation Principle). All user controllers share login/logout, filter settings, and common controller instances. Follows Dependency Inversion Principle by accepting dependencies via constructor injection.
Since:
2025-11-16
Version:
1.0
Author:
NTU SC2002 Group

  • Constructor Details

    • BaseUserController

      protected BaseUserController(User user, InternshipController internshipController, ApplicationController applicationController, LoginController loginController)
      Constructs a BaseUserController with the specified user and dependencies. Follows Dependency Inversion Principle - dependencies are injected, not created.
      Parameters:
      user - The user associated with this controller
      internshipController - Controller for managing internship operations
      applicationController - Controller for managing application operations
      loginController - Controller for managing login and authentication operations

    • BaseUserController

      protected BaseUserController(User user)
      Constructs a BaseUserController for the specified user. Uses default controller instances for backward compatibility.
      Parameters:
      user - The user associated with this controller

    • validateOwnership

      protected void validateOwnership(int internshipID, CompanyRepresentative companyRep, InternshipController controller, String action)
      Validates that the company representative owns the specified internship.
      Parameters:
      internshipID - The ID of the internship to validate
      companyRep - The company representative to check ownership for
      controller - The internship controller to use for validation
      action - The action being attempted (for error message)
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the rep does not own the internship

    • validateOwnershipAndEditability

      protected void validateOwnershipAndEditability(int internshipID, CompanyRepresentative companyRep, InternshipController controller, String operation)
      Validates both ownership and editability of an internship.
      Parameters:
      internshipID - The ID of the internship to validate
      companyRep - The company representative to check ownership for
      controller - The internship controller to use for validation
      operation - The operation being attempted (for error message)
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if validation fails

    • validateApprovedStatus

      protected void validateApprovedStatus(int internshipID, InternshipController controller)
      Validates that an internship is in APPROVED status.
      Parameters:
      internshipID - The ID of the internship to validate
      controller - The internship controller to use for validation
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the internship is not approved

    • getInternshipDetails

      public abstract String getInternshipDetails(int internshipID)
      Gets detailed information about a specific internship. Must be implemented by subclasses as authorization rules vary by user type.
      Specified by:
      getInternshipDetails in interface UserController
      Parameters:
      internshipID - The ID of the internship
      Returns:
      Formatted internship details
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if user doesn't have permission or internship not found
